alert.note: Alert for Hickman (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 01 at 12:06PM CST until January 01 at 12:30PM CST by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1230 PM CST FOR NORTHERN HICKMAN COUNTY... At 1206 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located 12 miles west of Centerville, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Centerville, Lyles, Nunnelly and Pinewood. This includes Interstate 40 between mile markers 151 and 159, and between mile markers 161 and 163. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM CST for Middle Tennessee. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
